Guidelines: Consider the structured process for strategic planning that incorporates innovation.
Consider the alignment of strategic goals with your organization's vision and mission.

Assessment Area: Culture of Creativity and Continuous Learning
Guidelines: Consider the promotion of a culture of creativity and continuous learning in your organization.
Consider the allocation of resources for innovation in your organization.
Consider the mechanisms for idea generation and implementation in your organization.

Assessment Area: Review and Assessment of the Strategic Plan
Guidelines: Consider the regular reviews and assessments of the strategic plan in your organization.
